explains: n. 沼泽，泥泞地；困境，尴尬的处境

sentences.en: Rain had turned the grass into a quagmire.
sentences.cn: 雨水已将这片草地变成了沼泽。

sentences.en: His people had fallen further and further into a quagmire of confusion.
sentences.cn: 他的人已在困惑的泥潭中越陷越深。

sentences.en: This is why we're still in this quagmire in Iraq.
sentences.cn: 正因为这样，我们还仍旧深陷伊拉克困境。
